scripts.test:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --config ./test/unit/jest.config.json --runInBand
scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_HOST=localhost typeorm migration:generate ./src/db/migrations/development/migration -d ./dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:generate:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production typeorm migration:generate ./src/db/migrations/production/migration -d ./dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_HOST=localhost typeorm migration:run -d ./dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production typeorm migration:run -d ./dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_HOST=localhost typeorm migration:revert -d ./dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production typeorm migration:revert -d ./dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.db:create: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_HOST=localhost ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm-extension/bin/cli.cjs db:create -d ./src/db/data-source.ts --initialDatabase postgres
scripts.db:drop: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_HOST=localhost ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm-extension/bin/cli.cjs db:drop -d ./src/db/data-source.ts --initialDatabase postgres
scripts.db:seed: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_HOST=localhost ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm-extension/bin/cli.cjs seed:run -d ./src/db/data-source.ts
scripts.db:seed:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm-extension/bin/cli.cjs seed:run -d ./src/db/data-source.ts
